title: Season 9 Start Date
body:
EDIT : Ranked Season 9 Officially Starts January 23rd.



Hi, 
Was wondering when the ranked season 9 would start?
When will they announce it?

I know that season 8 started in January, so it'd be likely for it to start then.
But remember that season 7 started in December, a month after S6 finished, i think this was because there weren't many big changes to the new season from the previous so they started it sooner.
Because season 9 doesn't have many big changes, i hope that it'll start sooner like in December sometime!

replies.body: From what I read, they want to test the new role ranked system for a while first, so might be a longer preseason. Most likely late Jan.
Waiting for this! Equal ranks for roles please.
[Then we can avoid lopsided matchmaking like this.](https://imgur.com/a/86Vn0k7)

That's about your MMR, not about bad matchmaking...

Edit#1: Your MMR on sites like op.gg is an *ESTIMATED* value. These ESTIMATED values can be hella wrong.

Could youpleaase update, ranked now starts on the 24th

https://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/competitive/whats-new-ranked-2019

It usually starts around late January, and given the huge preseason changes to ranked specifically this time around I imagine that will remain the same.

They usually announce the exact date around mid preseason so keep an eye on the front page of the client.
